posts.title: iPhone Controlled Paper Airplane
posts.content: Origami and technology collide to bring you the iPhone controlled paper airplane. Unlike the flimsy poor quality paper airplanes you’re used to building, this high tech version integrates state-of-the-art Bluetooth technology to ensure you get the best possible flight.

posts.title: Cocktails With A Literary Twist Book
posts.content: Barflies and bookworms alike will get a kick – and a strong buzz – after perusing the “Cocktails With A Literary Twist” book. No matter what poison you decide to drown your liver in, you’ll find a pun-tastic recipe to match, such as “The Rye in the Catcher” or “Gin Eyre”.

posts.title: Glow In The Dark Cards
posts.content: Experience your weekly card games in a whole new light when you play using the glow in the dark cards. This unique regulation deck add a novelty twist to regular card games as the images on the face cards transform and come to life under a black light.

posts.title: Casino Chip Whiskey Glass
posts.content: What better vessel for your favorite poison during your next poker night than this casino chip whiskey glass? This handmade gem stands at approximately three inches, holds up to ten ounces, and comes embedded with a genuine black poker chip on the side.

posts.title: Darth Vader Home Planetarium
posts.content: Learn about the vast cosmos like any self respecting Star Wars fan would with the Darth Vader home planetarium. Vader’s iconic black helmets sits ominously until the moment where a small hole at the top opens up to display the incredible sight of the Milky Way.

posts.title: MacBook Pocket Mirror
posts.content: Looking for a pocket mirror that shows your blatant obsession with Apple products? No bigger than an iPod Nano, these pocket mirrors are styled like a miniature MacBook Air – except the monitor has been replaced with a high quality reflective mirror.

posts.title: Rainbow Candy Bacon Strips
posts.content: Send your taste buds on a wild journey by blasting them with a combination of sweet and sour from these rainbow candy bacon strips. Each multicolored strip is soft, chewy and comes bathed with enough sugar to simultaneously rot and satisfy your sweet tooth.

posts.title: Waterproof iPhone Case
posts.content: Save your precious smartphone from a watery grave with the waterproof iPhone case. While encased within the tightly sealed sturdy plastic shell, your iPhone becomes impervious to water so you can avoid accidents or partake in some underwater photography.

posts.title: Thor’s Hammer Night Light
posts.content: Ward off night time monsters with the weapon of a mighty god when you possess Thor’s hammer night light. Endowed with unworldly powers, the hammer glows bright all night long so the soothing light provides an ideal environment for a peaceful night’s rest.

posts.title: 3D Moon Night Light
posts.content: Enjoy the glow a full moon every night with the 3D moon night light. The unique design of this night light gives off a soothing atmosphere and creates a 3 dimensional effect that allows you to see the entire surface of the moon in perfect detail.

posts.title: Hot Dog Criss Cross Slicer
posts.content: Grill up the best dogs you’ve ever tasted using this hot dog criss cross slicer. The distinct carved diamond pattern makes it cook faster, leaves behind crispy caramelized-edges, holds condiments better, and provides enhanced bun gripping traction.

posts.title: Multi Level Cat Climber
posts.content: Keep your kitty entertained by installing this multi level cat climber in your humble abode. The space saving design can easily be installed over any existing door to provide your feline with a cozy spot for exercising, sleeping, or plotting his next diabolical move.
